channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Watch Active PlugIn
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Watch Active PlugIn

item.title: CVE-2021-25422|2024-08-03T20:03:05.644Z -- samsung%20mobile -- watch%20active%20plugin
item.description: Improper log management vulnerability in Watch Active PlugIn prior to version 2.2.07.21033151 allows attacker with log permissions to leak Wi-Fi password connected to the user smartphone within log.

item.title: CVE-2022-25828|2024-08-03T04:49:43.938Z -- samsung%20mobile -- watch%20active%20plugin
item.description: Information Exposure vulnerability in Watch Active Plugin prior to version 2.2.07.22012751 allows attacker to access password information of connected WiFiAp in the log
